about_the_game:
Embark on a Route 66 journey and experience the ultimate camping adventure in Camping Park Simulator. As the manager of a vibrant camping park, you will have to keep your campers happy and the park in the best possible condition, from building and maintaining the park to managing the campers and their daily problems. And then build a real camping empire on the site.



Repair, hire, expand
Start by cleaning up, renovating what you find, then plan, build and improve. With its beautiful surroundings, engaging environment and demanding customers, Camping Park Simulator will be a real challenge. When managing the park, you need to take care of the different zones, each of which offers a different approach to management. Your guests will pitch their tents on the campsite, park their campervans on the car park, hire your campervans and visit the historical themed cottages.

Route 66 is a river of new tourists
The legendary road across America is full of attractions and historical sites that attract tourists. Your guests will be able to visit these iconic sites, explore the surrounding wilderness, but also enjoy modern attractions. Your role is to provide them with the best starting point on Route 66. Build the most extraordinary Camping Park.

Holidays for the whole family
Learn about Route 66's most popular attractions, including those for the youngest such as the famous ice cream parlour and cake shop. You need to remember that your park will be used by a wide range of customers with different tastes and ages, so when developing and expanding you will need to take each group into account.

Every zone is a new adventure
Camping Park Simulator is not just about building and maintaining a park - it is also about the special characters and unusual campers who bring your park to life. Variety of campers, each with their own unique story and personality, the simulator offers endless fun and challenges. Each guest is a separate story. Some of them will be remembered with a smile for a long time, talking about them in the local pub. Some will cause you a lot of problems and you will have to put out the fire more than once.

Grab your tools and start building your ideal campsite step by step!

name: Camping Park Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Become a campsite owner to bring people joy and unforgettable experiences! Be the first who dared to buy an abandoned park near Route 66. You're not afraid to get in the spirit of the story and decide to make sure the campsite is filled with lively, unusual tourists.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
